Posts.Content: Apr 19, 2016 10:36PM mrnmom2000 wrote: Just wondering if anyone else has had a problem with their hair being very thin after chemo. I finished chemo August 2014., my hair used to be very thick. I know have a lot of spots that are very thin. Should expect that it may fill in or just accept that fact that I may need to go back to a wig. It seems to slowly be getting worse.
Posts.Title: Hair Hair Hair - Another question Deen Krose53
